text: @atrupar @JoelLawsonDC California has 8400 patients (just CA) being monitored for Coronavirus. Dr.s have eliminated flu etc but they can't test them for the virus. No test kits. Why? I think it's deliberate so Trump can keep a lid on the actual number of cases reported to the public. It's insane.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
